item.title: New pooled library! 🎉 The pCMV-Rep78/68 scanning saturation mutagenesis library contains all possible single codon mutations of the AAV2 rep gene. It can be used to study the effects of rep mutations on production of a wide range of AAV capsid serotypes. https://t.co/dSIdBLEmIT https://t.co/svUmEpqXrM

item.title:
What are the origins of chronic pain in #LongCovid?
Studying hamsters, scientists show that #SARSCoV2 infections leave viral RNA in dorsal root ganglia, leading to pain sensitivity and disrupted gene expression in sensory neurons. https://t.co/M9jb6PVYeE @SciSignal #COVID19 https://t.co/ENZH25iWiH

item.title:
Viète's formula is this infinite product of nested radicals representing π.
It is named after François Viète (1540–1603), who published it in 1593 in his work Variorum de rebus mathematicis responsorum, liber VIII
[read more: https://t.co/Pm3mo9aYbZ] https://t.co/JM3IJ8VTX3

item.title:
Why is a full circle 360°? There are slightly different theories, but it is generally believed that this is because Sumerians & Babylonians used the sexagesimal numeral system with these 60 symbols, counting by 12 on the knuckles of the 4 fingers

item.title: Elevated anxiety often precedes anorexia nervosa. Patients with anorexia nervosa often describe hunger as pleasant, potentially because food restriction can be anxiolytic. We tested whether chronic stress can cause animals to prefer a starvation-like state. 2/7

item.title: @KordingLab @blamlab Indeed, hazard ratio decreases from 30 to 2.3 when adjusting for confounds. I don't have THAT much trust in statistical models. Re trend, how could the proportion attributable to cannabis use disorder grow so much (4 fold since 1990) if the hazard ratio itself does not grow?
item.description: @KordingLab @blamlab Indeed, hazard ratio decreases from 30 to 2.3 when adjusting for confounds. I don't have THAT much trust in statistical models. item.content:encoded: @KordingLab @blamlab Indeed, hazard ratio decreases from 30 to 2.3 when adjusting for confounds. I don't have THAT much trust in statistical models. item.title:
Cystisoma is a crustacean that lives between 600-1000 m deep in the ocean. Its body is totally transparent: only its eyes are pigmented. This one has a brooding pouch full of orange eggs

item.title:
@KordingLab @blamlab I actually buy the causal link... based on personal anecdotal experience.
But, based on that same anecdotal data, I think it is almost surely the case that cannabis only accelerates and exacerbates the situation for those who are already at risk for schizophrenia anyway.

item.title: Elucidating the brain’s structure-function organization is key to understanding perception. A classic example are cortical columns, a vertical organization of neurons w/ similar function. They exist in primary sensory areas but it’s unclear if they are present throughout cortex
item.description: Elucidating the brain’s structure-function organization is key to understanding perception. A classic example are cortical columns, a vertical organization of neurons w/ similar function. They exist in primary sensory areas but it’s unclear if they are present throughout cortex
item.content:encoded: Elucidating the brain’s structure-function organization is key to understanding perception. A classic example are cortical columns, a vertical organization of neurons w/ similar function. They exist in primary sensory areas but it’s unclear if they are present throughout cortex

item.title: Here, we asked whether area V4, a mid-level area of the macaque visual system, is organized into functional columns. We presented grayscale natural images & recorded responses of >1200 single V4 neurons in 100 electrophysiological recording sessions using 32-channel depth probes https://t.co/JGjN7K5AFE
item.description: Here, we asked whether area V4, a mid-level area of the macaque visual system, is organized into functional columns. We presented grayscale natural images & recorded responses of >1200 single V4 neurons in 100 electrophysiological recording sessions using 32-channel depth probes https://t.co/JGjN7K5AFE
item.content:encoded: Here, we asked whether area V4, a mid-level area of the macaque visual system, is organized into functional columns. We presented grayscale natural images & recorded responses of >1200 single V4 neurons in 100 electrophysiological recording sessions using 32-channel depth probes https://t.co/JGjN7K5AFE

item.title: We fitted the readout of a pre-trained robust ResNet50 on our V4 data to predict neuronal firing rates to natural images, achieving high performance. We treated this model as a “digital twin” of macaque V4 and used it for vast in silico experimentation https://t.co/0JgczU8kW3
item.description: We fitted the readout of a pre-trained robust ResNet50 on our V4 data to predict neuronal firing rates to natural images, achieving high performance. We treated this model as a “digital twin” of macaque V4 and used it for vast in silico experimentation https://t.co/0JgczU8kW3
item.content:encoded: We fitted the readout of a pre-trained robust ResNet50 on our V4 data to predict neuronal firing rates to natural images, achieving high performance. We treated this model as a “digital twin” of macaque V4 and used it for vast in silico experimentation https://t.co/0JgczU8kW3

item.title: We used our model to generate “Maximally Exciting Images” (MEIs) for each neuron. These MEIs exhibited complex features like textures, shapes, or even high-level attributes such as eye-like structures in line w/ tuning properties of V4 neurons identified using parametric stimuli https://t.co/nqmDLDkgtb
item.description: We used our model to generate “Maximally Exciting Images” (MEIs) for each neuron. These MEIs exhibited complex features like textures, shapes, or even high-level attributes such as eye-like structures in line w/ tuning properties of V4 neurons identified using parametric stimuli https://t.co/nqmDLDkgtb
item.content:encoded: We used our model to generate “Maximally Exciting Images” (MEIs) for each neuron. These MEIs exhibited complex features like textures, shapes, or even high-level attributes such as eye-like structures in line w/ tuning properties of V4 neurons identified using parametric stimuli https://t.co/nqmDLDkgtb

item.title: We verified our MEIs in vivo by developing a closed-loop paradigm for acute electrophysiological recordings of single neurons. The MEI of a single neuron consistently elicited higher neuronal responses than control natural images, suggesting it is indeed the optimal stimulus https://t.co/246tbzluLR
item.description: We verified our MEIs in vivo by developing a closed-loop paradigm for acute electrophysiological recordings of single neurons. The MEI of a single neuron consistently elicited higher neuronal responses than control natural images, suggesting it is indeed the optimal stimulus https://t.co/246tbzluLR
item.content:encoded: We verified our MEIs in vivo by developing a closed-loop paradigm for acute electrophysiological recordings of single neurons. The MEI of a single neuron consistently elicited higher neuronal responses than control natural images, suggesting it is indeed the optimal stimulus https://t.co/246tbzluLR

item.title: We noticed that MEIs from single sessions were more similar to each other than to MEIs from other sessions & quantified this using psychophysics. As neurons from one session are arranged orthogonal to the surface, this suggests that V4 tuning may be organized in a columnar manner https://t.co/Im4FGbHdxa
item.description: We noticed that MEIs from single sessions were more similar to each other than to MEIs from other sessions & quantified this using psychophysics. As neurons from one session are arranged orthogonal to the surface, this suggests that V4 tuning may be organized in a columnar manner https://t.co/Im4FGbHdxa

As neurons from one session are arranged orthogonal to the surface, this suggests that V4 tuning may be organized in a columnar manner https://t.co/Im4FGbHdxa

item.title: We employed a contrastive learning method to further quantify MEI similarity within and across recording sessions & found that the mean distance between MEIs in the embedding space was significantly smaller within a session than across sessions https://t.co/s9fWyEuFmA
item.description: We employed a contrastive learning method to further quantify MEI similarity within and across recording sessions & found that the mean distance between MEIs in the embedding space was significantly smaller within a session than across sessions https://t.co/s9fWyEuFmA

item.title: Moreover, the selectivity of the neuronal population was clustered in the similarity space, suggesting that V4 tuning properties identified using the neuron’s optimal stimuli can be separated into functional groups selective for a specific feature, reminiscent of cell types https://t.co/w3od121KcL

More than half of the world’s largest lakes have declined over the past three decades.
